document.id: City of San Mateo, Cal., Ord. No. 2011-10
document.heading: AMENDING SECTION 11.56.100, "RIDING -- ON ROADWAY OR SIDEWALK," OF CHAPTER 11.56 "BICYCLES," OF TITLE 11, "VEHICLES AND TRAFFIC," AND SECTION 27.04.058, "BICYCLE PARKING FACILITY," OF CHAPTER 27.04, "DEFINITIONS," AND SECTION 27.64.080, "USE OF PARKING AND GARAGE FACILITIES," AND SECTION 27.64.262, "BICYCLE PARKING FACILITIES," OF CHAPTER 27.64, "OFF-STREET PARKING," OF TITLE 27, "ZONING" OF THE SAN MATEO MUNICIPAL CODE TO IMPLEMENT THE BICYCLE MASTER PLAN
